sentences.sentence: The result can be static and acrimonious debate: Tree hugger!
sentences.translation: 结果可能导致相互指责与激烈的争执：境保护狂！

sentences.sentence: Just try to fool me, you crop tool using liar. [Tree Hugger via Twitter].
sentences.translation: 想骗我可没门，你这个用了剪裁工具的骗子。

sentences.sentence: But the transition from tree-chopper to tree-hugger is not happening fast enough.
sentences.translation: 但人类从“砍树者”过渡到“栽树者”的转变速度并不够快。
